title: What products does CA Technologies sell? - Quora

response.answer_text: We sell a broad range of solutions that help large companies Plan, Build, Test, Release, Operate and Secure their IT solutions. For example, our “CA Agile Central” product https://www.ca.com/us/products/ca-agile-central.html offers an agile-based system for planning and tracking the development of large scale projects. We offer similar solutions that address each subsequent stage of the IT application life cycle. Check out http://ca.com for more info.
They're a software developing company, I had the pleasure of working for them for awhile. They're primarily a B2B company.
